Rulings.Cat: ● “Alien Mars” will not negate the effect of “Mystic Tomato” that was destroyed by battle but had an A-Counter, since “Mystic Tomato” does not have an A-Counter in the GY, where its effect activates.

Rulings.Base: 1. "Alien Mars" will not negate the effect of "Mystic Tomato" that was destroyed by battle but had an A-Counter, since "Mystic Tomato" does not have an A-Counter in the GY, where its effect activates.
